title: Products
text1: These products are offered by participants of the platform. As most products require you to pick it up at the shop make sure you only choose products from local shops. If you need a product that isn’t here, please contact a shop that can provide that product and ask them to join PolloPOllo.
text2: To apply for donation of a product, simply click the “Apply”-button. Your application will be visible to donors browsing applications. Your open applications is listed in your profile page from where they can also be cancelled. When a donor makes a donation, you will be notified by email.
